articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Ring may come in four sizes and launch with Galaxy Z Fold 6 - Android Authority
articles.description: A rumor suggests Samsung is making a single model of the Galaxy Ring in four sizes. It could launch in late 2024 or early 2025.
articles.content:
• A new rumor suggests the Galaxy Ring could launch in Q3 2024 or early 2025.
  • The rumor also claims Samsung is making the smart ring in four sizes.
  • A 2025 launch date may sugges… [+1964 chars]

articles.author: Brady Snyder
articles.title: The Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro represent peak smartphone design - XDA Developers
articles.description: Google fully revealed the Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro, and these devices feature the best design we've ever seen on smartphones.
articles.content: Smartphone fans and reviewers flocked to praise Apple for making the iPhone 15 series more comfortable to hold, after years of boxy and angular iPhone releases. But while Apple is only just now figur… [+4566 chars]
